title: why i cant buy RP??
body: When i wanted to buy RP    I saw this information . So i try after 24 hours  but still cant buy .  I dont know why .. Pls tell me what should i do ??   tks

replies.body: We'd like to look into this and help out with your specific issue!  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our billing team can find out what's going on.  We'll respond to your ticket as soon as we can!
